org.mitre.openid.connect.service

Interface NonceService


  • public interface NonceService
    Nonce service interface
    Author:
    Amanda Anganes

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean alreadyUsed(String clientId, String value)
      Check whether a given nonce value has been previously used and stored by the client.

      Clear expired nonces from the database

      Return the set of nonces registered to the given client ID

    • Method Detail

      • create

        Nonce create(String clientId,
           String value)
        Create a new nonce.
        Parameters:
        clientId - the ID of the client
        value - the value of the Nonce
        Returns:
        the saved Nonce

      • alreadyUsed

        boolean alreadyUsed(String clientId,
                  String value)
        Check whether a given nonce value has been previously used and stored by the client.
        Parameters:
        clientId - the ID of the client
        value - the value of the nonce
        Returns:
        true if the nonce has already been used, false otherwise

      • getById

        Nonce getById(Long id)
        Return the nonce with the given ID
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the nonce to find
        Returns:
        the nonce, if found

      • remove

        void remove(Nonce nonce)
        Remove the given Nonce from the database
        Parameters:
        nonce - the Nonce to remove

      • save

        Nonce save(Nonce nonce)
        Save a new Nonce in the database
        Parameters:
        nonce - the Nonce to save
        Returns:
        the saved Nonce

      • getAll

        Collection<Nonce> getAll()
        Return all nonces stored in the database
        Returns:
        the set of nonces

      • getExpired

        Collection<Nonce> getExpired()
        Return all expired nonces stored in the database
        Returns:
        the set of expired nonces

      • getByClientId

        Collection<Nonce> getByClientId(String clientId)
        Return the set of nonces registered to the given client ID
        Parameters:
        clientId - the client ID
        Returns:
        the set of nonces registered to the client

      • clearExpiredNonces

        void clearExpiredNonces()
        Clear expired nonces from the database
